# removeProperty(_:)

**Instance Method**

Removes a property from the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func removeProperty(_ property: String!)
```

## Parameters

- **property**: The property to remove.

## Discussion

For additional information about properties see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/UserExperience/Conceptual/AddressBook/Tasks/AccessingData.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/20001023-103048].

## Working with Properties in the Record List

- **addProperty(_:)**: Adds a property to the group of properties whose values are shown in the record list.
- **columnTitle(forProperty:)**: Returns the title of a custom property.
- **displayedProperty**: The property currently displayed in the record list.
- **properties()**: Returns an array of the properties whose values are shown in the record list.
- **setColumnTitle(_:forProperty:)**: Sets the title displayed in the people picker for a property.
